title: Can't change my email
body: I can't change my email because when I try to do so the verification passcode is sent to my old Yahoo one, which has been deleted. I sent a support ticket but all I got was a bot telling me that it can't assist me with Account Recovery because I am logged into my League account on their support site. My problem is that I don't need my account recovered, I already have access to it. I just want to update my email address.

replies.body: You'll still need to talk with that accounts team in order to get changes made to your account. Make sure you click the option "I need help recovering my account" and you'll be signed out before you can continue with the ticket. Answer the verification questions, and then the agents will be able to help with changes.
I did as you said, & when I attempt to go to the support ticket I created I get a 404 error.
